name: OOORCS
description:
Defend your castle against an everlasting onslaught of OOORCS!

OOORCS! They attack the castle! Unfortunately, you are the only guard on duty. So it is up to you to send those vile creatures back to the stinking pits where they came from! Don't let them conquer your stronghold!

This game features online-highscores via OpenFeint!

*** GAMEPLAY ***
- tilt your phone to move left or right
- move to rockpiles to pick up rocks
- tap the screen to throw a rock
- hit orcs with rocks before they reach the top of the castle

If you come across any bugs, please report them to bugs@eiswuxe.de
